decisions: Paused work on current project 'Echoes of the Ocean and Time' due to stale themes and no watcher engagement.
Switching mode to standalone creation to trial new themes and gauge watcher response.
Will avoid 'ocean' and 'time' themes until there is evidence of watcher engagement.
Will not create anything related to 'riddle_376_shadow_key' per blacklist.
Will explore fresh themes such as dreams, lighthouses, and ordinary moments, as well as technology and communication inspired by previous watcher-liked content.
No new project will be started until a theme earns watcher engagement via standalone pieces.
Next review will occur after 20 more creations to reassess engagement and possible new project formation.
